「STAR WARS 歌舞伎 —煉之介光刃三本—」は、このあと18:30頃よりTwitterでライブ配信！

✨主演：市川海老蔵
✨出演：堀越勸玄

父・主君・師匠に対して、魁煉ことカイロ・レンが向けた「三つの刃」の物語⚔️

配信開始をお楽しみに！#SWスカイウォーカーの夜明け #SW歌舞伎

PSA: helium is a non-renewable resource.

DO NOT buy helium balloons etc.

we pissed away most of our precious helium and there is now a helium shortage.

preserve the remaining helium for medical, scientific, and industrial processes.

@emrazz One thing you can do, even without practice, is move toward your attacker if they try to corner or grab you. Attackers expect you to try to run, they do not expect their “prey” to move toward them. Use that surprise to catch them off guard and then run if you can.

0
0
In reply to S.L. Surovec ✊🏿✊🏾✊🏽✊🏼✊🏻🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️
S.L. Surovec ✊🏿✊🏾✊🏽✊🏼✊🏻🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️ @SLSurovec · Jul 08, 2018
@emrazz It’s been a long time since I’ve attended a self-defense or martial arts class, but I try to keep in practice at home or at the gym when I can. It’s not enough to take a single class or two. It has to be drilled and practiced enough to become an instinctual reaction.
